text:
@Yamiche There is remedy for the sick ones
God healing balm can heal any kind of illness
Coronavirus is powerless if you believe
If you're truly serious about your well-being, Request for God Miracle Healing Oil, A Healing balm for all diseases and illness
Life is a gift, keep it safe
Dm
